attributes.action: Bring back Birching for those found carrying knives or guns or other weapons with no good reason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the current media outcry about knife crime, I propose that the government bring back the Birch as a deterrent for those caught carrying knives, guns or other concealed weapons such as screwdrivers with no valid reason. Sentencing as follows :

10 lashes for the first offence
30 lashes of the second offence
3 years in Jail and 50 lashes for the 3rd offence.

I suspect once one person has suffered lashing, others may think twice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
